name: Kadir's Emerald Shard
effect: Gain 1 Æ. OR Any player gains 1 life.

name: Gex's Shattered Geode
effect:
Gain 1 Æ.
You may place the top card of any ally's discard pile into your hand.

name: Jian's Moonstone Shard
effect:
Gain 1 Æ.
Gain an additional 1 Æ that can only be used to gain a gem.

name: Lash's Quartz Shard
effect:
Gain 1 Æ.
Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. You may place that card on the bottom or the top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, gain an additional 1 Æ.

name: Xaxo's Flare
effect: Cast: Reveal the top card of the turn order deck, and then place it back on top of the turn order deck. If you revealed a player turn order card, deal 3 damage. Otherwise, deal 1 damage.

name: Adelheim's Amethyst Shard
effect:
Gain 1 Æ.
Any ally may draw a card and then discard a card in hand.

name: Brama's Buried Light
effect:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
Gain 1 Æ.

name: Garu's Torch
effect: Cast: Deal 1 damage. OR Cast: Focus any player's breach.

name: Xaxo's Pyre
effect:
Cast: Deal 1 damage.
Any ally may discard a card in hand. If they do, deal 2 additional damage.

name: Mist's Garnet Shard
effect: Gain 1 Æ. OR Cast any player's prepped spell.

name: Shimmering Cloak Of The Magus
effect: After a player finishes resolving their ability, that player deals 2 damage.

name: Imbued Shackles
effect: At the start of the game, set this next to a supply pile that costs 7 Æ or more. These cards cost players 1 less Æ to gain.

name: Glutton's Tooth
effect: When the last card in a supply pile is gained or destroyed, any player deals 6 damage.

name: Core Of Rage
effect: At the start of the game, set this next to a spell or relic supply pile. When a player gains a card from that supply pile, they deal 2 damage.

name: Cleansing Amulet
effect: After a player finishes resolving their ability, any player may destroy a card in hand.

name: Carapace Fragement
effect: At the start of the game, set this next to a relic or spell supply pile. When a player gains a card from that supply pile, that player focuses one of their breaches.

name: Thorned Whip
effect: When a player opens a breach, that player deals 2 damage.

name: Bones Of Deathmind
effect:
When a player opens a breach, that player gains 1 charge.

At the start of any player's turn, if that player has no closed breaches, that player gains 1 charge.

name: Accelerating Gauntlets
effect: At the start of your first turn of the game, gain a card that costs 4 Æ or less.

name: Essence Extractor
effect: When you play a gem that costs 5 Æ or more, gain an additional 1 Æ.

name: Brooch Of Attunment
effect: Once per turn, when you cast a spell that costs 6 Æ or more, gain 2 charges.

name: Bladed Crystal
effect: When you deal damage to the nemesis with a spell, that spell deals 1 additional damage.

name: Prism Of Destruction
effect: If you have no closed breaches, spells you cast deal 2 additional damage.

name: Forgotten Trinket
effect: At the start of your first turn of the game, focus each of your closed breaches once.

name: Precision Magnifier
effect: Spells you cast that cost 2 Æ or more deal 1 additional damage.

name: Shroud of Obfucation
effect: When you cast two or more spells during your casting phase, gain 2 Æ.

name: Verdant Staff
effect: When you gain a spell, gain 1 life.

name: Flowing Mantle
effect:
At the start of your turn, gain 1 Æ that can onlly be used to gain relics.

When you gain a relic, you may place it on top of your deck.
